My Favorite Game: MLBB

My name is Ali, and I love playing Mobile Legends: Bang Bang. It is a mobile game where you play in teams of five. Each team tries to destroy the enemy’s base. The game is fast and exciting!

There are many heroes in MLBB. My favorite hero is Layla. She uses a big cannon and attacks from far away. Some heroes are fighters, some are tanks, and some are supports. You must choose the best hero for your team.

I usually play in the evening after school. I play with my friends online. We talk and plan our strategy. It’s more fun when we win together!

MLBB is not just a game. It helps me think fast, work in a team, and have fun with my friends.
